Posts.Content:
Found a rather large lump about
 a month ago.  My family doctor was quick to act.  He took me off my HRT right away.  I had a total hysterectomy 2 years ago and been on HRT ever since.  I don't enjoy the lack of energy and hot flashes but I know why he took me off them. 
 
 
 
 
 
DD- diagnosed with Fibro 1/2011, hypothyroid, hysterectomy in 2009, slipped disc L4/ L5, migraines. Daily: tramadol, soma, Nortriptyline, Plus HRT.
Posts.Title: Had a biopsy yesterday now the wait.
